how did you get it to work? mine shows up and then dissapears on the dock, but i have the three things that should be in the launcher section

sometimes it takes some time to open...
i suggest that you delete the following folders:
"Users/username/Library/Preferences/League of Legends Preferences/"
"LolClient"
restart you computer afterwards and try to start the game. Wait a little bit, it sometimes takes a time to start the launcher (on my mac i once had to wait about 20 sec).
if it still doesn't work, delete the two folders again and reinstall the game.
i hope it works then, because i don't know what else you could do except follow the guides posted in http://eu.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=132051&page=21.
There it also says that it can take even about 10 min to start the launcher...

You can also try to quit following prozesses:
cmvs* (all that start with this, i'm not sure if they belong to lol, but they open when i start lol)
League of Legends/or all that have related names)
wineserver
